https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/cata1og/product/SIGMA/06522?lang=en®ion=SE","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":71}],"data":{}},{"key":"asqcv","text":"Antigen retrieval: Tris-EDTA, pH 9.0 or Sodium citrate, pH=6.0, 80° ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkq5a","text":"Tris-EDTA buffer (lOmM Tris Base, 1 mM EDTA, 0.05% Tween 20, pH 8.0): Mix 1.21 g Tris Base, 0.37 g of disodium EDTA in 1000 ml of distilled water. Adjust the pH to 9.0 with 1N Na OH and then add 0.5 ml of Tween 20. Store at RT for up to 3 months; for extended storage, store at 4 °C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6m89i","text":"Sodium citrate buffer: Tri-sodium citrate (dihydrate) 2.94 g, Distilled water 1 L. Mix to dissolve. Adjust pH to 6.0 with 1N HCI. Add 0.5 ml Tween 20 and mix well. Store at RT for 3 months or at 4°C for longer storage.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3929BD99C52811EE85A00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://vectorlabs.com/vectastain-elite-abc-kit-standard"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1A239B5FC53011EE85A00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/cata1og/product/SIGMA/06522?lang=en\u0026region=SE"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9npdl","text":"Wash freshly sectioned slices of tissue 2-3 times with 1X PBS to remove OCT. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tn1o","text":"Quench sections for   in   of quenching solution (  30% H2O2,   methanol, and   1X PBS).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":57,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.8","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pv2h","text":"Transfer sections to the DAB working solution (SK-4100, Vector Laboratories) under a fume hood. Monitor until it stains well. Well-plate containing sections were gently shaken during staining and the reaction was stopped with transfer to 1X PBS based on dark-signal intensity on the fastest arising staining.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
